Posts.Content: I agree with Michael F's comments-everyone getting ready for RALP should read this thread. They should also look at: "]https://www.cancerforums.net/threads/56084-Getting-ready-for-RALP-what-do-I-need-onhand [/URL]. At some time in the future it would be nice to boil down the comments from these two threads and create a sticky topic that addresses RALP surgery and the immediate days afterwards. Happy Thanksgiving to everyone
Posts.Title: My first week since da Vinci...
